org.newdawn.slick.opengl
Enum ImageData.Format

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<ImageData.Format>
      org.newdawn.slick.opengl.ImageData.Format
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<ImageData.Format>
Enclosing interface:
ImageData
public static enum ImageData.Format
extends Enum<ImageData.Format>

The format of the image data. This class is used to encapsulate the different image formats that could be load and used by OpenGL.

Author:
Martin Karing <nitram@illarion.org>

Enum Constant Summary
ALPHA
          The format for alpha-only images.
BGRA
          he format for RGB images with alpha.
GRAY
          he format for grayscale images (no alpha).
GRAYALPHA
          he format for grayscale images with alpha.
RGB
          he format for RGB images (no alpha).
RGBA
          he format for RGB images with alpha.
 
Method Summary
 int getBitPerColor()
          Get the count of bits used to encode one color.
 int getBitPerPixel()
          Get the amount of bits used to encode one pixel in case the image uses this format.
 int getColorComponents()
          The amount of color components (including the alpha channel) of the image using this format.
 int getOGLType()
          The OpenGL type that fits best to load this image.
 boolean hasAlpha()
          Check if the image with this format has a alpha channel.

hasAlpha

public boolean hasAlpha()
Check if the image with this format has a alpha channel.

Returns:

public int getColorComponents()
